Description: Poster showing Russian giant throwing sticks in a game of land domination. The pegs he is knocking over are the capitals of opposing nations – including Berlin (Germany), Vienna (Austria-Hungary), and Kraków (at the time the site of a militaristic Polish rebellion against Russia).
